website_summaries.verdict: A lot of them appreciated the excellent cushioning, comfort, softness and lightness of the Under Armour HOVR Sonic, especially on short and long-distance runs. Although some users have issues with its fit and the slippery outsole, others still recommended this neutral running shoe because of its excellent construction, and fantastic performance on the road and other paved surfaces.
pros: A lot of wearers commented that the shoe was very responsive
According to some testers, the Under Armour HOVR Sonic was supportive
The shoe was good-looking, according to some purchasers
Many reviewers noted that the upper construction was breathable
Several wearers were impressed with the Under Armour HOVR Sonic's sound quality
The majority of the testers said that the shoe was comfortable
A handful of buyers reported that the shoe has a variety of color schemes to choose from
Some of the consumers appreciated its wide toe box
The shoe has excellent cushioning, noted by many buyers
A handful of reviewers admired the right amount of traction it provided
Based on some reviews, the shoe was lightweight
A good number of consumers reported that the Under Armour HOVR Sonic was best used for short and long-distance walking and running activities
cons: One of the runners commented that the Under Armour HOVR Sonic was uncomfortable to wear
After an hour of wearing it, he developed a sore spot on top of his right foot
Several users noted that the shoe was slippery on wet conditions

customer_reviews.title: I was sceptical due to all the hype on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical due to all the hype on the shoes. After running a 5k in brand new shoes I had no issues with my feet. I took the shoes off and wanted to put them back on due to the comfort level of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A

customer_reviews.title: Solid new UA runner
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Springy. Actually hard to run at a slower pace. Only negative is the lace hole near the toes. I can feel it on my foot and it’s a bit annoying after a few miles. I’m a bigger runner (207lbs) and these hold up. Over a 100 miles on them and no knee pain.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bachman

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe that runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes seem to run small. Ordered what I normally wear but much too small went up half a size but would have preferred a full size but appears they are only offered in full sizes and I needed a half. Had problems hooking up to UA app but went to YouTube and quickly found instructions from UA that had me up in running in minutes. Shoes are comfortable and very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Glen T Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but the sole wears out way too fast
customer_reviews.text: Comfy but tend to wear and tear easily. Update: Having worn for 3 months, about 3 times per week, the sole wore out unbelievably fast. I only ran about 300 km and the outermost layer of the sole has completely gone at the edge. Decreased from 5 stars to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Kong

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews about hot under armour shoes running in small size, I'm usually a 9, 9.5 and I order a 10. It fits me a little big so I think my original size will fit perfect to my feet. The shoe is great is really comfortable and have a nice design. I have a month with them and I run every day and they still look great. Next time I will try the CT version
customer_reviews.author: Pablo M't

customer_reviews.title: Size up half a size
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered these and really liked them but they were really snug on his toes, we returned/swapped for a half a size larger than his usual size and they fit perfect. He really likes them, the return process was super simple and quick also.
customer_reviews.author: megan.six

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe as expected from a great company.
customer_reviews.text: Ran large, my last two pairs of UA shoes were 9's, the Bandit 3's and Scorpios. These I had to go 8 1/2. Also they took some breaking in as the sock liner is tight around the ankle but breaks in fast. Super comfortable and great looking especially with shorts. Very breathable upper. I love this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Christian P.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and break in was short. I use the predominately for CrossFit trainings and some treadmill running. Shoes are true to size and hug the foot very well. I have logged approx 150miles running total and numerous workouts without any sign of wear on the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I have to comment that these are really one of the most comfortable pair of running shoes I have purchased. They are very light, comfortable, and hug your foot comfortably. They are very light with enough cushion to protect your foot. No complaints yet, I've only worn them a couple times. They are very easy to slip into as well, which I really like. Not a lot of lacing and unlacing, easy to pull snug, and hit the road.
customer_reviews.author: Objective Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: ... its possible its original under armor shoes sole looking like this is press i don't know how its possible ...
customer_reviews.text: check images i use this shoes just really for go to my car and then when back from work to in parking and again in home just this kind of uses but if i never even run with this shoes and not even walk enough how its possible its original under armor shoes sole looking like this is press i don't know how its possible anyways i am still using
customer_reviews.author: Chishti Mian

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is accurate and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of UA running shoes that I have purchased in years. I normally purchase UA training shoes and these caught my eye. I received them less than 24 hours after I ordered them and I am very happy. Wore them for a 2 HR gym session an these shoes are awesome. Fit is perfect and they are very comfortable. I can see myself buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan OKeefe

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Great for walking around. Boost is still much better for running in my opinion. But these a still great and much less expensive than the ultraboost.
customer_reviews.author: stephen seal

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly. Fit very well and are comfortable. Durable as well. Would buy again. UA shoes appear to be improving their quality nicely and making considerable gains on Nike. I no longer buy Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have tendency to roll my ankles.
customer_reviews.text: I have tendency to roll my ankles even during walking. I do not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed how comfortable this shoes is and keep in mind ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed how comfortable this shoes is and keep in mind I'm over weight and it handled me very well
customer_reviews.author: Essa Khalid Essa Alessa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly. They are so comfortable. After back surgery I had a difficult time trying to find comfortable cushioned shoes. I came across these and they are amazing. I am able to walk around and stand for longer periods of time. They are extremely light and well ventilated. I will be purchasing another pair of these in the future
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Adame

customer_reviews.title: Favorite running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Ran my second marathon in these shoes! Very very comfortable. The stretch laces are weird at first and often times I had to retie them halfway through a run to tighten them but I eventually adjusted to just tying them tighter in the first place. Excellent shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Typical UA q
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, grip and bounce. UA has never let me down. Tried 3 shoes with Prime Wardrobe. Kept these.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Clark

customer_reviews.title: Poor shoe material
customer_reviews.text: Shoe material did not hold up, began splintering and unthreading around sole. Very comfortable. Will likely just try another pair of UA running shoes to see if this is a common theme
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Not only are they comfortable but highly fashionable. Received a lot of compliments as I rocked them on the town. Bought a second pair that I only were out while my older pair I wear for everything including working out.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these fit! Use to wear Nikes for years but have given these a chance and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: pch898

customer_reviews.title: Best yet.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'-1, 215 lbs and these are by far the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. I plan to buy a second pair for an upcoming half marathon. If you are on the bigger size, do your joints a favor and buy these. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: COLIN

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes received damaged Should had ordered from Under Armour
customer_reviews.author: Steve Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for distance.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable right out of the box. Breaks down faster than other running shoes I have worn.
customer_reviews.author: Jwill

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! So many compliments. Will buy another pair if they become available again
customer_reviews.author: Str8 Outta 512

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, well made, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I have problematic feet, but this shoe is great. Super comfy, light and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: True to size, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: As expected with every pair of UA should. Exceeded expectations, very comfortable. I use for running and weight training.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe - Bad Inner Sole
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is really great to wear and the solid bottom sole is awesome. It is very light weight and pleasant looking. But, the inner sole is slipping all the time whenever I run, so this is a big minus. SOCK LINER is bad for this shoe
customer_reviews.author: Divya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe and extremely hard to find in stores and online in most sizes , this is my third pair of HOVR Sonics in red.
customer_reviews.author: Rob McJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, very comfortable to run in, much easier on my knees than anything else I have had before, they look ugly in the pictures but in real life they are actually quite beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Egor

customer_reviews.title: Good for running distance
customer_reviews.text: Good for running distance, it does well absorbing the impacts but dont play sport with these they may cause ankle twist and sprained
customer_reviews.author: Obo

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, fits true to size, great for long days on your feet. Easily gets dirty due to type and color of material is the only con.
customer_reviews.author: James Lee III

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love those sneakers , perfect for the gym. Over a year and still look brand new even though i use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: marvin victor

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: I run on a treadmill and they are the most comfortable,super lightweight shoes ever.
customer_reviews.author: George Mota

customer_reviews.title: Ammmmazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe. Most comfortable i have even owned. Fit as expected. Pretty shoe. I own 4 pairs of these... one in each color.
customer_reviews.author: elad farchi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe yet, and I’ve been wearing UA since they started.
customer_reviews.author: jack wick

customer_reviews.title: I get complimented every day!
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Only had 10.5 in stock and I take a 10... Funny thing they run about 1/2 a size smaller! Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.author: RxAmazon

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoe with enough support
customer_reviews.text: I jog with this shoe and it is very comfortable helps an older runner like me and is very friendly to my knees
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Too small for size 15 (32.5 cm / 12.8")
customer_reviews.text: I have 32.5cm (12.8") foot. Sonics are too small for size 15. I have no problems with nike/reebok/columbia 15 (some of them are 1/2 size large)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light and extremely comfortable shoe for workouts or casual.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hall

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, took me a few runs to get used to the fit as the tounge of the shoe has an elastic strap. This shoe is very breathable also.. definitely an upgrade from the speedform genesis.
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: The shoe fits!
customer_reviews.text: This product fit perfectly, and that surprised me given the fact when I buy shoes online they are usually too big or too small. These shoes are lightweight and comfortable; they’re perfect for running.
customer_reviews.author: Martin R

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, delivered way before the estimated time. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Whoot whoooo
customer_reviews.text: So pleased for the perfect fit! Thank you under armour for (as always) having consistency in your product !!!
customer_reviews.author: Kjelse

customer_reviews.title: You will be surprised with this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about HOVR sonic. Very comfortable and very light . Thank you underarmour
customer_reviews.author: Ayedh

customer_reviews.title: Best running sneakers ever used a must buy for serious ...
customer_reviews.text: Best running sneakers ever used a must buy for serious distance runners and runners in general under armour never disappoints
customer_reviews.author: joseph walker

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Ride
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pair of shoes you have ever owned! I never want to take them off
customer_reviews.author: John E Pierson IV

customer_reviews.title: Not a running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe for the gym, not a running shoe. More like a slip on shoe, very comfortable but with no support for running. I'll stick with my Nike Zoom Structures for running. A actual running shoe for running
customer_reviews.author: K. Sikkenga

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's HOVR Sonic Running Shoes Man, Orange (Salmon), Size: 41
product_meta.description: If you are a cross-country skier, Under Armour HOVR Sonic offers you a totally new racing experience. As soon as the foot touches the ground, you will immediately understand why the Under Armour HOVR cushioning is so revolutionary: this shoe ensures you a light and reactive stride, kilometre after kilometre. The upper in structured and breathable mesh ensures excellent stability of the foot while the removable midsole allows you to customize the insole. Under Armour HOVR technology provides a "weightlessness" feeling, favouring the return of energy and reducing the force of the impact of each step The Energy Web compression network contains the Under Armour HOVR foam that returns all the energy of your steps Upper for a snug and breathable fit that guarantees lightness combined with directional strength and unparalleled comfort to cover long distances The ventilated panel in the central part of the foot increases breathability The particular structure of the tongue is fixed to the insole by means of flexible support tabs to maintain an enveloping fit over the whole foot External TPU counter for greater support and structure The removable Orthoclase antimicrobial midsole is modelled on the shape of the foot to ensure personalized comfort and cushioning The rubber blown under the forefoot is light but at the same time incredibly reactive The highly abrasion-resistant rubber positioned under the heel helps absorb the contact with the ground Differential: 8 mm Weight: 225 g
feature_bullets: Under Armour HOVR technology provides a "weightlessness" feeling, favouring the return of energy and reducing the force of the impact
The Energy Web compression network contains the Under Armour HOVR foam that returns all the energy of your steps
Men's Under Armour HOVR Sonic running shoes
Upper for a snug and breathable fit that guarantees lightness combined with directional strength and unparalleled comfort
The ventilated panel in the central part of the foot increases breathability
Particular structure of the tongue is fixed to the insole by means of flexible support tabs to maintain fit over the whole foot
